alerts.description:
* WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected.

* WHERE...A portion of east central Florida, including the following
counties, Lake, Orange and Seminole.
alerts.title: Flood Advisory issued August 22

alerts.description:
* WHAT...Hurricane-force winds are expected.

* WHERE...Coastal regions of South Carolina and Georgia.

* WHEN...Starting at 10:00 AM EDT, August 23.

* IMPACTS...Significant damage to trees, roofs, and power lines.
alerts.title: Hurricane Warning issued August 22

alerts.description:
* WHAT...Severe thunderstorms with large hail and damaging winds.

* WHERE...Western Oklahoma and northern Texas.

* WHEN...Until 8:00 PM CDT, August 24.

* IMPACTS...Hail up to 2 inches in diameter and wind gusts up to 70 mph.
alerts.title: Severe Thunderstorm Emergency issued August 24

alerts.description:
* WHAT...Extreme heat and dangerously high temperatures.

* WHERE...Central Arizona, including the Phoenix metro area.

* WHEN...Daily from 10:00 AM to 8:00 PM MST through August 30.

* IMPACTS...Heat-related illnesses are likely for those spending extended time outdoors or without access to air conditioning.
alerts.title: Excessive Heat Advisory issued August 22

alerts.description:
* WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected with near-zero visibility.

* WHERE...Eastern Montana and western North Dakota.

* WHEN...From 6:00 PM MDT August 25 to 6:00 AM MDT August 27.

* IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible due to heavy snow and strong winds.
alerts.title: Blizzard Warning issued August 25
